Enhancing Customer Centricity 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=733&user=10620> 	
Our Omnichannel team, specifically the Customer Care and Product teams, have launched WhatsApp as a communication channel with our customers across all our brands. This is key initiative in our journey to enhancing customer centricity through digital transformation allowing us to get closer to our customers, provide faster, more personalized assistance and enhance the overall customer experience. 

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=733&user=10620> Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=733&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Weekly Internal Opportunities
